website_summaries.verdict: A huge pack of high-end towels at a great price.
pros: 50 pack includes five colors with 10 towels each, with each measuring 11.5x11.5 inches
Towels are made from 88 percent polyester and 12 percent polyamide and are 100 percent machine washable
Designed to be lint and streak free
cons: Absorbent material is thin, can wear down over time

customer_reviews.title: The RED ones do run color
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about these microfiber clothes before I purchased them. The first thing I did was wash the red and orange ones in the kitchen sink with laundry detergent. The color did run. Then I put all 4 colors in the washing machine and ran it through the cycle without detergent and added 1 cup vinegar and NO fabric softener!! They came out perfect with no more running colors and super soft. If I hadn't had to pre-wash, I would've gave this 5 stars. I like them. They are a decent size for cleaning at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TammyZ

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and they were exactly what I was looking for. They are lightweight without being too thin. Almost my entire house is hardwood or tile, and I use these on my swiffer mops in place of the expensive wet cloths. I throw some in a bucket with warm water and lysol, ring out and just toss in a pile to be washed as I go along. Always a clean cloth without spending a bunch to keep my house clean with three boys living here! I hope these last a while because they are doing a great job cleaning today!
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage! They bleed the color and stains whatever you are cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: These cloths bleed color when they get wet! especially the red ones, so much that I left a wet one on top of my washing machine and it is now RED!!!! I can't get the red tint out of my washing machine. Do yourself a favor and look at other cloths, they are also very thin! I tried to save money buying these and I ended up trowing away the whole package. Just put one in water and you will see how it turns the water red!
customer_reviews.author: Dan V

customer_reviews.title: Bleeds color like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a little bit to see if it got better but I have found that all of the color dye bleeds continously when wet even though I have washed the rags multiple times. They've stained several surfaces in my house and have ruined some other kitchen towels I washed them with months after washing them multiple times. I got seperate colors because it was nice to differentiate which area of the house would be cleaned with a certain color but now i wish I just got plain white rags
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are cheap and even cheap they are not worth the money Pick another vendor
customer_reviews.text: Color bleeds on furniture and any surface. They need to be washed on very hot to try and eliminate color bleeding
customer_reviews.author: Vera Aument

customer_reviews.title: magnetic ant hand like grip
customer_reviews.text: These cloths pick up every single thing they come in contact with and they grip it with the might of 100 little ant hands. My kid knocked over the bedding for her hamster and tracked pine shavings into the hall. Pine shavings ended up everywhere. I washed the rugs and clothes along with these cloths that I used to clean with. Everything came out fine except these cloths had hair, rogue threads, and pine shavings, ect; covering every inch. You can't get it off the cloth! The pine shavings are now one with the cloth! Annnnnd they bled all over anything in the wash. So dying ant hands 😢
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: nice small cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and small cloths. I actually liked them when I started using them. BE CAREFUL about RED ones. They leak red onto everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bunches of Cloths
customer_reviews.text: Lots of Cloths in this package, it would be fantastic for people who do professional cleaning. I just bought them for the household and probably won't have to ever buy microfiber cloths again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be used for in the kitchen.  Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The product is not color fast and so the color runs. Be careful where you use it. It's trash
customer_reviews.author: Garfield M. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not a 50 pack - lying to customers
customer_reviews.text: For aesthetic purposes, I decided to fold them up and put it into a basket for storage. I counted how much was in the box and looks like there’s only 40. They’re definitely great for cleaning but saying it’s a 50 pack is a whole lie. I feel like I got scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Anh

customer_reviews.title: Thin fabric works great for small jobs and spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love these cloths but they are thinner than I expected. I can see right through it if I hold it up into the light. I like it like that though because it fits between the little nooks and crannies a lot better than a thick cloth would. Not for bigger jobs like mechanic or construction. Better if you only use it in the home. Such beautiful colors I will not use bleach on it just incase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathelyn

customer_reviews.title: 50pack with box is junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUT THESE FOR AUTOMOTIVE DETAILING. I thought theses would be a great for wiping after buffing/polishing. There are loose threads that will cling to your paint while buffing or polishing paint. I then tried just using these for interior and glass, and same deal, little tiny white threads are left behind while cleaning, which i then had to go back and wipe everything down with a proper microfiber towel. There are much much higher quality towels in similar quantity for cheaper at my local big box store. I WILL NEVER EVER BUY THESE AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: bdubs

customer_reviews.title: Replaced disposable face wipes perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my face every night. I wanted to stop using disposable wipes and these have worked perfectly. They shrink a little and they bleed a little dye the first time you use and wash them and they collect ANY loose string or bits that are in the dryer so you have to kind of pick them clean after they've dried. It's just because they're clingy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quantity over Quality
customer_reviews.text: In the past I ordered 32 ct. And the quality was good. Not too thin, not overly thick. These are a bit thin and small but so far they have done the job. One note that is not mentioned enough is that they work best if you hand wash them and hang them to dry they are more effective if you are inclined to drop them in the washing machine do not place them in the drier. Lint attaches to them and they don't perform as well and if you use them for windows and your glasses you'll see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive towels to use around the house
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use around the house to wipe counters with. They were inexpensive enough where I don't have to worry too much about losing a few here and there (or giving them away), but be aware that they feel a bit on the thin side. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Photographer | Tech Pro | Outdoor EnthusiastTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: do not like this product first smell very bad after one time ...
customer_reviews.text: do not like this product first smell very bad after one time use i had to threw it away because of the smell. tried to wash with soap and lysol but still smell. bought it over a month ago and just start use it now so i cant even return them. spent almost $17.00
customer_reviews.author: Mykal IRS RAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Use for Everything!! The red and orange do fade so wash with like colors. Other colors, no issues. Also, if you read the care directions...FYI, do not use dryer sheets with these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Holland

customer_reviews.title: so Universal
customer_reviews.text: Love these micro fiber clothes, really cleans my eye glasses without any water or cleaner. We use them for napkins, and numerous other clean up projects. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have around. I really like them to clean everything. I use them to clean my car, kitchen, grill, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: please do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Works for me... This is an update after my first wash to microfiber....please do not waste your money...after the first wash I'm very disappointed, they're coming apart. I use gentle wash and did not include any other cloths while washing them. Cheap labor and low quality. Change from 5 stars down to 1. Please do not waste your money....spent a little more money and get better quality. Bye
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: OK for one time use. Cloths are small and colors bleed if you are wetting the cloth. Good for buffing when waxing a car but not for spot cleaning upholstery. There are better microfiber cloths out there that are more durable & can be washed and reused, which likely cost much more but that is what I prefer. Also the labels are pretty large and you'll want to cut them off as they get in the way. Overall, just ok for the price, but I will not buy again and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spin

customer_reviews.title: STAINS EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I left a red cloth in the bathtub which bled all over the tub. Now I have a big red blotch in my tub that will not come out. STAY AWAY!!! Also ruined my bath mat.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkdiver28

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning cloths!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful colored washcloths! The colors are so vibrant and easily recognizable while in your wash. They dust very well, and clean windows ok. A bit streaky if the cloth is not dry enough. To clean a countertop they work well, however you want to make sure if you are using a cleaner with a bleach, they will leave the cloth bleach marked. These could be made with more ansorbstion, however with the sake price I paid, and the quality cloths they are, I would re purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Hope❤️

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: The microfiber cloth that’s under the one that was delivered to me is a real one for detail in my automobile. Very disappointed in the product. The rags are too thin too small for anything but wiping your nose with.
customer_reviews.author: MADD

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Amazon suggested them to me during The Great Paper Towel Crisis of 2020. Seriously though, I've used like 1 paper towel since I got these. (Yay environment) And I've got 3 kids under the age of 5. We messy. My 2 year old loves having a wet one at meal times so he can just clean his hands up himself and I don't worry about them getting stained or anything. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Placed

customer_reviews.title: These microfiber cloths bleed the color when they get wet.
customer_reviews.text: These towels bleed their color even after washing. I use microfiber towels all the time and was excited to find this pack of 50; however with the color bleeding from the towels, I threw them all away.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, ok for price
customer_reviews.text: This microfiber towels are so bad, I have to used at least four to clean my car's hood. I used a polish, was and cloth, but the last process to shine, took me forever with this towels. They are so skinny and weak. Not recommended for a hard job.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Beware dye transfer!
customer_reviews.text: Fine little shammy towels. They aren’t super absorbent, but they’re nice to have on have for dusting or wiping down bathroom fixtures. The first two rags I used bled A LOT, which would have been a nightmare if I had been wiping down baseboards, but I think it was a fluke. You can see in the video attached how little bleeding there was in subsequent rags.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I like the color coded towels! Pro Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great for cleaning, sanitizing and disinfecting jobs. They are colored so you can designate cleaning, sanitizing and disinfecting processes. For example: Red towel is usually for highly contaminated areas as blue is for light dusting and so on! Microfibers need to be washed together only! and not with other towels. Use proper heat settings on laundry to make sure proper cleaning of chemicals, waxes, oils, etc...Do not use bleach. Use microfiber cleaning solutions to add to your detergents.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: As easy to grab as paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I expected, but they work very well. I use them as dish cloths, hand towels, wipes for counters, windshield cleaners. As easy to grab as paper towels, but more absorbent. Handy to have in kitchen, laundry room, garage, and barn!
customer_reviews.author: Kalee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about these...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about these -- a cleaning cloth is a cleaning cloth -- and microfiber is nice -- BUT when I received them I threw them all in the washing machine and then the dryer -- The yellow ones and some of the blue ones had RED dye transferred onto them from the red cloths -- cleaning cloths need to be colorfast -- I would return them but it's too much trouble for a low cost item
customer_reviews.author: C. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great for pretty much anything microfiber cleanable
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: This review is SPECIFICALLY about the 50 pack white disposable cloths, NOT the colored cloths. These are plush and soft, and do a great job for anything that you would use a regular microfiber cloth for, and are especially terrific for furniture polishing. Also, when they are really soiled you can chuck them out and grab a new one. They are advertised as machine washable, but don't plan on it more than once. I just rinse them out and use them over and over, they hold up well. They can be a little too linty for eyeglasses, but they are the best cloth I've seen for cell-phone and tablet screens, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. I bought to use in houses I clean. They are small and thin. I have to use many in just one room. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: re-consider this pls
customer_reviews.text: i bought this thought it would be the same as those ones from acme or home depot. it turns out im right. the quality is different too. Each cloths is so thin and barely absorbs water. if you are cleaning kitchen countertop or island, dont use this. these are not as good as you think. packing was the worst, all the cloths was push into a small dirty box. there is NOOOOO room in the box for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Agent329

customer_reviews.title: Thin and small but not horribly bad.
customer_reviews.text: These are rather thin. But if you think about it..... they are good for small jobs or one specific job. The thicker ones you buy at Sam Club are much bigger and thicker of course but it may be too much towel for a few jobs. So they end up in the trash prematurely. So these might be something you like. And you get 100. My neighbor and I split the cost and item in half so it was better for our wallets. Also, you could probably wash these and get your moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Owen's.

customer_reviews.title: Little box, little rags, last long time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use in a body shop. The smaller size is perfect for degreasing and wiping up polishing compound but doesn't scratch fresh paint. The box is small but they are packed into the box tightly. After they are soiled I use them in my mechanics bay as grease rags until they are unusable then they get thrown away. They could be cleaned and used over and over again but I wouldn't want to put dirty rags in my washer but they could be hand washed if you are cheap. I will never buy paper towels again as long as I can get these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Probably better to spend a little more money
customer_reviews.text: These will be fine for me right now. However, it's a good thing I wasn't looking for super high quality.. They are quite thin. Oh, and the red is definitely not red. It's a peachy color. I'm more upset about that than I probably should be, lol. If you are looking for cheap cleaning rags, these are ok. But, if you are trying to purchase nice microfiber towels, I'd spend a bit more money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Impressive purchase
customer_reviews.text: Stuffed into one small box with easy to access front, this makes a wonderful place to store microfiber towels without taking up tons of room. Im very pleased with the quality, durability and softness of these and would buy them again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: denny_sf

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best microfiber clothes I have ever used. I was shocked at how soft they were. I used one cloth to wipe down all of my kitchen cabinets and it held up to the task and I found I didn't need to switch out rags at all during the process of cleaning because it would come clean during rinsing. I am really impressed with these and thankful I purchased them in a large quantity. I don't foresee ever buying another brand of cloths. And will purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was SUPER excited to receive these because you get so many for a good price. They are soft, and easy to wash. they are a decent size, about the size of a normal handtowel. However, once you start cleaning, and add a cleaning solution to them they become sticky. They absorb water well BUT not any cleaning products. They are a nightmare to clean with. They get stuck on the counters/table- its like it creates a sticky cling. Buy the more expensive brand where you get less, they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: acorm

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Thought They Would Be
customer_reviews.text: They are decedent towels but were much smaller than I thought they would be. You must wash them before use otherwise they do not pick up water well right out of the package. Colors are very bright and the wipes are made very well but are very undersized in my opinion. Will not purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Walt O.

customer_reviews.title: Great to use as dust cloths
customer_reviews.text: I purchased terry cloths for wet type cleaning and bought these microfiber ones for dusting and dry applications... these things are great for picking up sheetrock dust and work great for polishing furniture. I wanted something cheap that I could use once and throw away... nothing I hate more than cleaning dirty rags in the clothes washer ... so these do the trick. Great product and great price... I don't feel guilty in the least about throwing them in the garbage when done. It's a whole lot cheaper than using paper towels and way more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Moore

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and thinner than I thought :-(
customer_reviews.text: These are not a very large or thick microfiber towel. Disappointed because I use several of them quickly since they are so small and thin, especially doing heavy cleaning you'llhave to constantly grab for a fresh clean one. Thankfully there's several in this pack so I can wash and dry those and keep going. I would have gladly paid more for thicker better quality. Live and learn
customer_reviews.author: Shortfused

customer_reviews.title: Great Microfiber
customer_reviews.text: I love these microfiber cloths. They have proven to be perfect facecloths and get my makeup off quickly. They are also great for household clean-ups. I washed them separately before they went to work. I did not notice any bleeding of colors or loss of color. They are still bright and beautiful. They are not thick like some I have used, but thinner. They easily go into the small spaces when I am washing the car or cleaning the bathroom or kitchen. The price is right for these great cloths,too.
customer_reviews.author: JudyO

customer_reviews.title: You will reorder when family takes yours!
customer_reviews.text: If you care for your microcloth towels, they will do all the things they are supposed to do. Read laundry care label. I color code the towels for each purpose. Some for dishes. Others for the icky stuff. Perfect for glass and mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Judy D.

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. I am nervous to use them because of all the negative reviews talking about staining. I wish I had read that before buying. I would rather pay more for better quality. These tear very easily and don't hold up well to use. I am throwing them away after use because they become so tattered.
customer_reviews.author: M.Splt

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty!!! 1st one out of the bag was so filthy I threw it away. By the time I had removed the rest of them, my hands were filthy as well. These are so thin you can see thru them. I won't reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Bling700

customer_reviews.title: Handy little microfiber cloths, great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little on the thin side, but not too thin. I use these to remove finger prints from my electronic devices, monitors, and my glasses. It's handy to have the higher quantity on hand since I have to wash them separately from the rest of my laundry (can't use fabric softener or dryer sheets, or they make stuff smeary). Wish they didn't have the annoying tag on every single one, but overall..great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: catnipRN

customer_reviews.title: Love that MICROFIBER and these are well made and soft
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these color coordinated towels for his janitorial work and I use them at my home as well...they work well for a variety of cleaning and polishing needs. one thing to know DO NOT DRY THEM IN THE DRYER with ANY TYPE OF DRYER SHEET---it will ,make them much less water absorbant if you do. They really last and wash and dry up well.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very good value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to remove makeup and they do the job perfectly. After use, I rinse in the shower, hang to dry, and use again. The size, fabric, and having no thick edges makes them light weight. They are terry towel texture, but thin, and really get the cream removers off cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: CROCGRANDMA

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt what I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: We got these because we are staying in a very humid rain forest climate for a few months. Since it would not be easy to just get paper towels or anything very easily we thought these would come in handy. They get stained and dirty very easily and I tried every cleaning technique I could and they just wouldnt get clean. They do work as a sweat rag while in the jungle but if only using for that, get a different shape.
customer_reviews.author: NadaBrahmaBaby

customer_reviews.title: Straight rag quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These rags are good value for the money. I do windshield repair I clean people's windshields after I'm done repairing the windshield. They're pretty good reservant of wiping the windshields all the time. I would definitely recommend washing them right away before you use. Softens them up a little bit. The long-lasting and durable I've had the last set for nearly a year now. And they've been washed many many many times and they still hold up.
customer_reviews.author: B.m

customer_reviews.title: Great value and plush cloths!
customer_reviews.text: I use these microfiber cloths for so many things! Instead of paper towels to save money and the environment, to clean with , to wipe the dogs paws off when it rains..... it’s a great big box full of what seems like never ending microfiber! These are thick and plush and I was not expecting that at all! I throw these in the washer and dryer time and time again and they come out great!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Love

customer_reviews.title: Thin microfiber cloths
customer_reviews.text: Because these are thinner than most microfiber cloths, they get into smaller spaces easier and do a great job. I have assigned a different task to each color, such as Orange just for cleaning bathrooms, Blue just for washing dishes, etc. So very happy with them. Even use the green ones on my swiffter wet mop and use it for quick damp mopping.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R Keller

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I purchased a pack of around 18 microfiber clothes from Walmart over a year ago and they finally got worn to the point of needing new ones...well, Walmart no longer has them so I tried these, honestly for the price. Well, they haven't disappointed....They hold up well and there's plenty in the pack that I can reuse or make disposable if possible. If you need cloths for various household duties and don't wanna empty your pockets, I would recommend purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLovely76

customer_reviews.title: So many of them!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Get a lof for your money. Tons of uses! I use mine for swiffering....dusting....keep one in my car for cleaning my glasses while i drive....so many uses.... and theyre nice because since theres so many you can just toss them when your done of you had to use it for something really gross (like cleaning up puke) or just rewash them if u used it for something not so gross, like cleaning a counter top!
customer_reviews.author: "Mr. T."

customer_reviews.title: It's great for dishes UTV's and your eyeglasses also for cleaning around the house
customer_reviews.text: This is not only good for cleaning cars however try using it for doing dishes it's very good it works great and you throw it in the washer afterwards you can also use it for cleaning your TVs and Stereos things that you don't want to scratch it works really nice for cleaning glasses if you wanted to clean your eyeglasses as well it works great does not scratch up your eyeglasses please it's nice and clear and shiny I'm glad I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite products, I use them for everything household and Automotive. Absorbing and keep my car paint clean after I wash it! Plus the are washable Great value !!!
customer_reviews.author: L Maggie Bryer

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I like to clean. My car that is. Was tired of spending $$$ on microfiber cloths. Looked around and found this decent buy. They arrived quickly and naturally I had to try them out. They did not disappoint. Makes getting the dust and dirt up fast. So easy and fast to clean my car and everything else that needs it. Definitely a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL! I just received these cleaning cloths. The first thing I did was wash & dry them to minimize color bleeding. I washed them using detergent (no fabric softener) & air dried them. They are already falling apart! The stitched edging on all of them has already started to unravel. You can see the fraying from the pictures. I don’t have much hope for these when I start using them for actual cleaning. Will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: I use these for washcloths!
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and they're more than soft enough to use on your face. I keep a stack in the bathroom to use as a towel to pat dry and they're perfect. Just throw in the laundry after use and boom. They do tend to lose some of that softness after about a year so I buy a new pack and use them around the house and in the car. No big deal. Such a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: K Household

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME !!!  LOVE THEM !!!
customer_reviews.text: WE'VE HAD THESE WONDERFUL AMAZING CLOTHS FROM AMAZON AND WE USE THEM ALL THE TIME.....FOR EVERYTHING.....FROM THE CAR, YELLOW FOR THE INTERIOR WITH ARMOURALL , BLUE FOR THE WINDOWS WITH WINDEX....THE OTHER TWO COLORS FOR INSIDE....POLISHING FURNITURE, DISHES AND KITCHEN, ONE IN EACH OF OUR BATHROOMS......AND THERE IS STILL A LARGE STACK IN THE LAUNDRY ROOM READY TO BE USED. THEY DO NOT FADE OR BLEED. SO SOFT...SOFT...SOFT.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Travis

customer_reviews.title: So thin.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that there were so many microfiber towel that came in this package, and then I found out why. These towels are so thin and not that big, no wonder they gave me so many. They are a little bit bigger than a face towel you'd use at home. Overall they're doing the job although, I have to use more towels than I wanted too.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Multi use product I can’t live without.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago and I love them. Mine didn’t bleed at all and they work great on my counter tops which are white quartz. They shine my appliances and are gentle on cabinet finishes. At then end of the day I put it on my Swiffer and mop the floor. Also can use a clean damp one to get the cat hair off the couch. Better than anything I bought for cat hair. Next time I’ll buy the 50 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheaply made compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed. I was expecting to get a great deal on this. When I opened it and compared to the one I use to buy it is small and thin. I mean you get 50 microfibers but you will realize it's cheaply made. I'll go back to the amazon basics that I used to buy. Save your money browse and research.
customer_reviews.author: A.I.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these are good to use once or twice especially for dirtier jobs, then throw away. For auto detailing I would not use these for removing wax or sealant or any finer paint type work. Would use these to clean interior wheel wells etc. For paint work I use microfiber products from the Rag company. also sold on Amazon, top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Williamson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ready clean cloths!
customer_reviews.text: I like a clean dish cloth every couple of days, and I use them for rags after a few washings if they are too yucky looking from heavy use. If I clip the corner, I know it's a rag. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: dreamhow

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: I saw these for sale at other stores but figured I'd check here first for better deals. These were so cheap per cloth that I was skeptical, figured I'd get at least one use out of each and it'd still be worth it. But washing 5+ times and they're still like new. Everything you expect out of a microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Great instead of tons of paper towels or feather dusters!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! Can use for sooo many things and MUCH mor effective for dusting. Actually traps and removes dust rather than flinging it around like u do with a feather duster. I clean absolutely everything with these. Don't know if they last thru multiple washings, but at least one or two and probably more. Very glad to get tip for cleaning and very happy with product .
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper than paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I love these cloths! I have been doing a lot of heavy cleaning and using paper towels got expensive. This is the second time I have ordered these and, while paper towels have their place, I have been using these exclusively for cleaning. When I finish for the day, I throw these into the washer and they are ready to be used again. I will be using these for cleaning from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gremillion

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your time and money on these rags
customer_reviews.text: these are so cheaply made. I bought two packages and when they came I didn't open them right away and by the time I did the seller closed the return time. these things fall apart in the washer. I thought i was buying the same quality as costco sells THE SURPRISE WAS ON ME. Absolute junk. sure would be nice to get my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Wood's

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to reduce our consumption of paper towels and it works well. We've cleaned up spilled coffee, wiped down dinner tables, dry knives, etc. We've reduced our paper towel usage to almost zero. Essentially just reserved for pet accidents. Great to keep a stack of these handy in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Economical option to using Swiffer Pads.  Excellent cleaning product.
customer_reviews.text: I have pets and use a Swiffer duster that I use to dry and wet mop my floors. Swiffer cleaning pads are expensive and can only be used once. These microfiber cloths can be washed and re-used and do an even better job than Swiffer products for catching fine dust particles on floors, windows, baseboards, and furniture, and can also be used to wet mop floors.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Skerratt

customer_reviews.title: JUST OK
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price but these microfiber clothes are a bit skimpy on the thread count. Definitely not 360's. So if you are looking for a quality microfiber cloth with a lot of pick up power, pay a bit more and get the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: They hold up well and do not bleed color
customer_reviews.text: I wash these cleaning rags separately from other laundry. They are used both wet and dry. The color does not run surprisingly no matter what chemical I use them with. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Tavares

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. They were a little smaller than I thought, but they're great for everyday kitchen counter wipes in the kitchen, and I keep one with my Windex and one with my dusting spray for everyday touch-up cleaning. They looked perfect after one wash, we'll see how long they hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Far smaller than I thought, so good thing theres a bunch of them. They're also not very soft compared to other tags I've used before. However, they still work, and they clean up EXTREMELY well. I figure I'll be able to get 4 cleanings out of these before I trash them. I usually only wash a rag twice.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: Dye bleeds and super thin! Dont recommend for commercial use!
customer_reviews.text: Super thin you can see thru them if you lift them up to the light. I dont recommend buying these for commercial use. I have a cleaning business and bought these according to the same specs of a different brand that i have boughten from and these dont come close to the other brand. I bought this brand because the price was great and it came with more clothes than my previous buy. Also beware of the dye! The red ones bleed dye and you will probably end up staining something!
customer_reviews.author: Araceli

customer_reviews.title: seem like decent microfiblre cloth
customer_reviews.text: Purchased them to make homemade face masks. seem to be the right size if folded in half. some studies show these are effective as disinfecting wipes with bleach etc due to the fibre. Only thing is they warn not to bleach or wash in hot water, so I will be washing them first before making masks. Price was good
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many purposes - especially RV travel
customer_reviews.text: These can be used at the kitchen sink, every day cleaning projects and especially travel. Very easy to set up a portable sink area and use these re-usable cloths rather than throw away paper towels. I've also used these for providing elder care and easy to wash up and use over again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dianne

customer_reviews.title: These seem real
customer_reviews.text: ive gotten micro fiber towels for like $20 for a 4 pack, so this worried me at first sight, but for sure these are really nice towels, i use them on my painting projects an throw um out or my car an reuse them, work great so far, i like them alot and real reasonably priced, ill buy again =]
customer_reviews.author: Steven P

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Always good to have a big supply cause once they get dirty they really stop being scratch resistance. I just wish they didn't put a label on each of the towel since the only thing to do to make sure the rage doesn't scratch the car is to rip off the label and when you do that you sometimes tear the twoel on the corner where the table was.
customer_reviews.author: lore valdes

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning anything!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bundle and various colors. I have one color I use to clean my lenses on my glasses which work way better than the microfiber cloth piece the eyeglass place reluctantly gave us. We clean everything with these. They work great are soft and dry quickly. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Great for many things
customer_reviews.text: These are great for dish rags. I read they are useful for more than dusting and I keep one with my spray to wipe with 409 and I use one on my swifter, instead of the disposable ones and I use them to separate my dishes, so they don't touch and I use it in the car for the dash - so many uses!
customer_reviews.author: Prez

customer_reviews.title: Smears dry erase boards but good for cleaning other surfaces
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and brightly colored. I’m using them to clean in my classroom. You can only use them once or twice before washing, they tend to smear the white board with the color of the marker. They’re good for cleaning though and a good price for how many you get.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMorales69

customer_reviews.title: Small and paper thin
customer_reviews.text: These rags are very small (as described) but they are also thin enough that I could watch TV through one them. the 50 pack takes up about 1/2 the volume of the 30 pack from Sams Club, which is where I'll be buying them in the future. On the up side, they were cheap so they will be single use disposable for me (Cheap was why they got a second star)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Shrimplin

customer_reviews.title: Good price, Good cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are good little cloths for cleaning, bathing absolutely love them for removing make up. The little fiber grab it all. So much cheaper then buying ones that say they're made for makeup removal.. They could be a little thicker but the amount of cloths you get for the price is awesome. Will definatly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hergenreter

customer_reviews.title: Much thinner than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 50-pack of microfiber towels at the local warehouse store and I was expecting the same thickness. Unfortunately these are not very thick and consequently do not hold as much liquid in them so I have to frequently wring them out. I should have expected this based on the price but they'll still work for me, just not for the tasks that I intended to use them for.
customer_reviews.author: pablomac

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are not "ultra soft" nor "scratch free" microfiber towels leaving scratch marks on my vehicles' exterior paint. inferior quality product; avoid at all costs. Better to pay for quality than quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Van Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Spent so much time researching looking for red and bought these for the red only. So what did they send. Dark orange, light orange and the other colors. Really! They are so so small, very thin and flat I thought it was the 1/2 pack. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Use them to clean my house floors! I would recommend washing first as some of the coloring from the towels came out when I was cleaning. Also just wash them together with nothing else or else you risk color transfer onto the rest of your clothes. Other than that, great prosuct
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Give them as a THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these towels to give away to my customers after detailing a car. But as for using them myself to detailing a car, no way. They bleed their color and I don’t need those colors on the paint & interior of a car after cleaning & Detailing. I did use them for rubber tires and engine bay. I just throw them away after. For me it’s not even worth washing to reuse.
customer_reviews.author: SCABHUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Very good value to replace paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Took a little longer to receive but worth the wait. After initial washing did not bleed color. Very soft and absorbent. Purchased to replace so many paper towels. Very colorful in a basket next to paper towels. Still using paper towels for the really yucky things! Bought some for my son and daughter also.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, yet effective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my bathtub as it was just professionally repainted and requires gentle scrubbing care for cleaning. These are not meant for absorbing water, but they make great soft cleaning agents for bathtubs and sinks. The only thing I would recommend is to wash them first as the dyes will wring out as you’re using them to clean. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Yes !
customer_reviews.text: These are great and for the price they have been worth every cent ! They certainly aren't the specialty rags but get the job done without the hassle of worrying about loosing one - windows, granite counters , showers and auto ...so far !
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Wayne

customer_reviews.title: TINY :D
customer_reviews.text: didn't check the description, but these towels are TINY :D I used like 15 just to wax my car which is sucks, but they are so cute :D lesson learned, need to check description next time :) BTW, why every towel must have a huge label ? you just waste so much time ripping them off :(
customer_reviews.author: Esenbek

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaning Clothes
customer_reviews.text: Love these clothes. Great for cleaning and reusable. I use with bleach solution to clean items and counters. Washable so great value
customer_reviews.author: BCDenny1

customer_reviews.title: These are so thin they are the  equivalent of one ply toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: These are so thin they are the equivalent of one ply toilet paper, they are so thin that they absorb nothing, they’re not particularly soft. My compliments on the color, they’re bright and vivid. Undoubtedly they would serve better as decorations than as a towel
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Reesman

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: cleans everything in my house. Kitchen cabinets, counter top, stove, wooden floor, bathtub and sinks. Use a glove if you wouldnt like to get your hands dirty. As a few reviews have suggested, I use different colours for kitchen, bath and floor cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nits

customer_reviews.title: Love the towels and the price
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased the towels to fry off my car after washing it. They do a great job of absorbing the water. However, I discovered that the microfiber is good for cleaning eye glasses so I wrap my glasses up in one when I'm not wearing them and if they get smudged I use a dry microfiber to remove the smudge and the lenses are so clear!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hughes

product_meta.title: S&T INC. Microfiber Cleaning Cloth, 50 Pack
product_meta.description: Size:50 PackThe highly durable Viking Microfiber Cleaning Cloths are perfect for all of your cleaning needs. Whether you are dusting furniture, wiping down your kitchen counters, detailing your car, or cleaning your boat, these non-abrasive microfiber towels will not let you down. The 11. 5" x 11. 5" cloths are super absorbent. Once you are finished with the towels, you can throw them in the washer with similar items. Do not use fabric softener with microfiber.
feature_bullets: Ultra soft, scratch-free cloths are ideal for cleaning any surface

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,649 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
